item.title: Build a static website using Hugo and deploy it on GitHub
item.author: Xinliang Lyu
item.description: I learned how to build a simple personal webpage using Hugo and deploy it on GitHub today. I must say it is not the simplest way to build your own personal website. In order to do this, you should be comforable with basic coding process and command line: for Mac it is terminal application, for windows, it is PowerShell Why? The whole process isn’t through graphic interface through clicking and dragging.
